desc: Jewellery through a mother's eyes with a loving twist.

layout.text:
The Perfect Gift for Mother's Worldwide
As seen in VOGUE, MadeForMums Finalist
I design engraved jewellery keepsakes for bottle feeding and breastfeeding mums. Our Reminder Rings feature the message ‘move this ring from hand to hand’ which can be used as a helpful breastfeeding aid. 
 Having formula fed my first born and breastfed my second creating a collection to celebrate both choices was close to my heart and one I wanted to share with other mums.
Happy Shopping,
Emma x
